mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id as item_id, i.title as title, i.pic_path as picPath, count(*) as total FROM tb_order_item i LEFT JOIN tb_order o ON i.order_id = o.order_id WHERE YEARWEEK(date_format(o.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) AND o.status = 4 GROUP BY item_id, title, picPath ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
